pains.title: What Problems Does It Solve?
pains.subtitle: Three roles, three major pain points

p1.label: Scenario 01
p1.title: PM / Sales Challenges
p1.description: Every time clients send a bunch of requirements, it takes hours to organize, break down, and estimate hours. Quote too high and scare clients away, quote too low and risk losing money. Revising quotation versions back and forth is time-consuming and error-prone.

p2.label: Scenario 02
p2.title: Boss / Finance Concerns
p2.description: Took on many projects but don't know which ones are actually profitable. Quotation formats are inconsistent, profit margins are hard to track. Want to control costs but lack real-time data to support decisions.

p3.label: Scenario 03
p3.title: Team-Wide Challenges
p3.description: Quotation process lacks standardization, everyone does it differently. Newcomers don't know how to estimate, veterans rely on experience but lack data. Team collaboration efficiency is low, information is scattered everywhere.

workflow.title: How It Works
workflow.subtitle: Four steps to complete professional quotations

step1.title: Select Client + Create Project
step1.description: Choose existing client or add new client data, fill in project name, expected delivery time and other basic information. System automatically loads client's historical quotation records for reference.

step2.title: Paste Meeting Notes, AI Breaks Down Features
step2.description: Directly paste meeting notes with clients or requirement descriptions. AI automatically identifies and breaks down into structured feature lists, including frontend, backend, design and other work items.

step3.title: Role × Hours Calculate Costs
step3.description: Assign roles (frontend engineer, backend engineer, designer, etc.) to each feature and estimate hours. System automatically calculates total cost and suggested selling price based on your configured hourly rates.

step4.title: AI Generates Three Quotation Plans and Exports
step4.description: AI automatically generates Basic, Standard, and Premium quotation plans, each with different feature combinations and prices. Export professional PDF quotations with one click, ready to send to clients.
